author: gigi81
body:
In light of the recent move to opensource powershell on Linux, I was wondering if there is any plan to opensource the DSC pull server.
There is already a uservoice for this:
https://windowsserver.uservoice.com/forums/301869-powershell/suggestions/12428307-opensource-the-pull-server

On the uservoice Justin King explains very well why the community needs this part of DSC opensourced. For some reason is the only part that is still proprietary and only included in the server editions of Windows.

comments.author: erwinwildenburg
comments.body:
I would really really like this too!
But is the code for having a pull client even available? That part is not available in nano server also.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: DSC Pull Server isn't part of PowerShellCore, continue tracking it on Uservoice

title: Opensource the DSC Pull Server
